title: Spectacular Spain with Alex Polizzi
overview: Spain is a land rich in history, tradition, culture and natural beauty, with a wide-ranging cuisine based on fresh local produce. Join Hotel Inspector Alex Polizzi as she embarks on a personal tour, sharing her passion for the country, culture and people, and making some new discoveries along the way.Alex explores all it has to offer region by region, from its remote villages to its cosmopolitan cities, seeking out its best-kept secrets.
